TopicTitle: Streaming playthrough with the USI constellation of mods.

Articles.Content:
Just starting a new playthrough of Roverdude's mods including USI, Karbonite and others.

We'll be build lots of bases and stations to better support integration with KSPILite in the future.

Come join the fun in chat, there will likely be lots of explosions since I haven't play these mods before.

http://www.twitch.tv/wavefunctionp
